String.toolTip: Use this manual to learn how to summon a Free Traders Collective warhorse with a movement speed of 290. Echelon 1–3 only.
Use this manual to learn how to summon an Enlightened Union warhorse with a movement speed of 290. Echelon 1–3 only.
Use this manual to learn how to summon an Iron Order warhorse with a movement speed of 290. Echelon 1–3 only.
Available only to the adjunct commander. Drag into the alliance supply shop window, accessable via the Activities menu, to begin.
Learn to summon a teleportal for teleporting allies to battle. (Exarch only)
Learn to summon a guard for defense of the alliance. (Exarch only)
Learn to summon a wooden barricade for defense of your fort. (Exarch only)
Learn to summon a fixed cannon for defense of your fort. (Exarch only)
Learn to summon a war banner that increases the power of nearby Free Traders Collective members. (Free Traders Collective echelon 1 only)
Learn to fortify the defenses of nearby Free Traders Collective members. (Free Traders Collective echelon 2 only)
Learn to speed the movement of nearby Free Traders Collective members. (Free Traders Collective echelon 3 only)
Learn a prayer to increase the resistance of nearby Free Traders Collective members. (Free Traders Collective Echelon 4 only)
Learn to summon a war banner that increases the power of nearby Enlightened Union members. (Enlightened Union Echelon 1 only)
Learn to fortify the defenses of nearby Enlightened Union members. (Enlightened Union Echelon 2 only)
Learn to speed the movement of nearby Enlightened Union members. (Enlightened Union Echelon 3 only)
Learn a prayer to increase the resistance of nearby Enlightened Union members. (Enlightened Union Echelon 4 only)
Learn to summon a war banner that increases the power of nearby Iron Order members. (Iron Order Echelon 1 only)
Learn to fortify the defenses of nearby Iron Order members. (Iron Order Echelon 2 only)
Learn to speed the movement of nearby Iron Order members. (Iron Order Echelon 3 only)
Learn a prayer to increase the resistance of nearby Iron Order members. (Iron Order Echelon 4 only)

String.string: Skill Manual: Activate a Noctenium Solution
String.toolTip: Noctenium Solutions can be equipped on weapons.
Learn to summon a guard for the defense of the alliance. (Exarch only)
Learn to summon a guard for the defense of the alliance. (Exarch only)
Learn how to teleport to Executor Adiar in Fort Tulufan. (Free Traders Collective only)
Learn how to teleport to Executor Derene in Fort Elena. (Enlightened Union only)
Learn how to teleport to Executor Frateko in Fort Dragonfall. (Iron Order only)
Learn to get additional gold when looting gold. (Free Traders Collective only)
Learn how to get additional reputation credits. (Enlightened Union only)
Learn to get additional stun resistance. (Iron Order only)
A long-ranged grenade with stunning properties. (Can only be used during PvP in the alliance domain.)
A deployable bomb that inflicts area damage when stepped on. (Can only be used during PvP in the alliance domain.)
A long-ranged grenade with slowing properties. (Can only be used during PvP in the alliance domain.)
A deployable bomb that explodes after a set duration and inflicts area damage. (Can only be used during PvP in the alliance domain.)
A long-ranged grenade with blinding properties. (Can only be used during PvP in the alliance domain.)
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Purchased Material]</font> Available for purchase through the alliance quartermaster at each alliance forum, this item is used for making bombs.
An HP potion available to use only while in an alliance territory or during the World Competition period.
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Dropped Material]</font> Noctenium-infected animal skin that is found in the alliance domain.
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Dropped Material]</font> Noctenium Tissue that is rarely found from noctenium-infected animals in the alliance domain.
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Gathered Material]</font> Ore with veins of noctenium. It's found in ore from the alliance domain.
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Gathered Material]</font> Ore with a high noctenium content. It's found in ore from the alliance domain.
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Gathered Material]</font> A store of powerful energy derived from noctenium. It's found from crystalline energies in the alliance domain.
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Gathered Material]</font> A store of protective energy derived from noctenium. It's found from crystalline energies in the alliance domain.
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Gathered Material]</font> A flower petal laced with noctenium. It's found in plants from the alliance domain.
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Gathered Material]</font> A plant seed contaminated with noctenium. It's found in plants from the alliance domain.

<font color = '#2478FF'>[Dropped Material]</font> Animal blood contaminated with noctenium. Its glowing appearance indicates it may have useful material properties. Found from gorillas in the Free Trader domain.

<font color = '#2478FF'>[Gathered Material]</font> A banana peel contaminated with noctenium. The noctenium has turned the peel into some kind of leathery material. Can be gathered from banana trees in the Enlightened Union domain.

<font color = '#2478FF'>[Gathered Material]</font> A sliver of mineral with a high noctenium content. It appears to be strong enough to use in making weapons. Can be gathered from noctenium ore in the Iron Order domain.
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Purchased Material]</font> A bottle used for alchemy. It's available for purchase through the alliance quartermaster at each alliance forum.
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Quest Material]</font> Powdered noctenium with the impurities removed. Used to create a skill-enhancing noctenium infusion. Can be obtained through alliance quests.
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Purchased Material]</font> A special hardener used to turn noctenium powder into a paste. It's available for purchase at the alliance shop in each alliance forum.
A forging stone made of noctenium powder. (Used to enchant equipment.)
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Dropped Material]</font> A rough mass of noctenium found in noctenium-infected monsters. Found from boss monsters in the alliance domain.
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Purchased Material]</font> A device used to infuse a noctenium membrane with summoning energy. It's available for purchase at the alliance shop in each alliance forum.
A wand that summons an arachnen infused with noctenium. [Only one summoned creature can be brought out at a time.]
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Dropped Material]</font> A mass of noctenium found in noctenium-infected monsters.
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Purchased Material]</font> A device used to infuse a noctenium membrane with summoning energy. It's available for purchase at the alliance shop in each alliance forum.
A wand that summons an ovolith infused with noctenium.
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Dropped Material]</font> A mass of noctenium found in larger noctenium-infected monsters.
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Purchased Material]</font> A device used to infuse a noctenium membrane with summoning energy. It's available for purchase at the alliance shop in each alliance forum.
A wand that summons an orisk infused with noctenium.
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Dropped Material]</font> A mass of noctenium found in noctenium-infected BAMs.

<font color = '#2478FF'>[Purchased Material]</font> A material our researchers have determined will infuse noctenium into equipment. It's available for purchase at the alliance shop in each alliance forum.
For crafting weapons.
For crafting armor.
It's useful to melt something. (Compound with noctenium Powder and noctenium tissue to create Potent Hydrochloric Acid.)
Hydrochloric acid used to melt noctenium-contaminated objects.
Sulfuric acid used to melt normal equipment items.
Sulfuric acid used to melt superior equipment items.
Sulfuric acid used to melt rare equipment items.
Sulfuric acid used to melt legendary equipment items.
A fortune stone extracted from normal equipment items.
A fortune stone extracted from superior equipment items.
A fortune stone extracted from rare equipment items.
A fortune stone extracted from legendary equipment items.
Teleports you to the infiltration beacon location designated by your Assault Commander. <font color = '#c21919'>[Warning!] Only exarchs, commanders, and echelons can use this scroll.

Key required for keeping a noctenium extractor running. <font color = '#c21919'>[Warning!] The item will drop on the ground if you ride a vehicle, die, use a teleport scroll, perform unstuck, or go outside the territory.
A liquid material not of this world used to make Tramondane weapons. (Compound with Tramondane Eye to create a weapon.)
A stone not of this world used to make Tramondane weapons. (Compound with Tramondane Blood to create a weapon.)
A material used to make noctenium infusions with skill-upgrading properties.
Concentrated infusion. Use to create multiple infusions with skill-upgrading properties.
Temporarily turns you somewhat invisible. (This effect is canceled if you use a skill or are attacked.)
Temporarily turns you completely invisible. <font color = '#c21919'>[Warning!] This item is usable within allicance territory only. The effect will disappear if you teleport or ride a mount.
Summons a totem that neutralizes invisibility on monsters and players in range.
A bugle that summons a legionnaire to fight for you. (For echelons 1, 2, 3, and 4)
A bugle that summons a legionnaire to fight for you. (For echelons 1, 2, and 3)
A bugle that summons a legionnaire to fight for you. (For echelons 1 and 2)
A bugle that summons a legionnaire to fight for you. (For echelon 1 only)
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Dropped Material]</font> A noctenium-infected animal tooth that is found in warthogs in the alliance domain.
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Dropped Material]</font> A noctenium-infected animal horn that is found in mugatos in the alliance domain.
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Dropped Material]</font> Noctenium-infected animal skin that is found in noctenium sabertooths in the alliance domain.
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Dropped Material]</font> A noctenium-infected animal bone that is found in cromoses in the alliance domain.
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Dropped Material]</font> Noctenium-infected tree bark that is found in cromoses in the alliance domain.
Clears current skill cooldowns when used.
Cancels negative effects on you when used.
Increases crit rate by 1% every time your current HP decreases by 1% from your maximum HP.
Temporarily improves skills. Different effects are produced depending on the skill types.
Temporarily turns you somewhat invisible. (This effect is canceled if you use a skill or are attacked.)
Summons a totem that neutralizes invisibility on characters and monsters within range.
<font color = '#2478FF'>[Quest Material]</font> A sample of noctenium melded with metal ore.
Temporarily improves skills. Different effects are produced depending on the skill types.
Temporarily turns you somewhat invisible. (This effect is canceled if you use a skill or are attacked.)
Summons a totem that neutralizes invisibility on characters and monsters within range.
A long-ranged grenade with stunning properties. (Can only be used during PvP in the alliance domain.)
A deployable landmine that inflicts area damage when stepped on. (Can only be used during PvP in the alliance domain.)
A long-ranged grenade with slowing properties. (Can only be used during PvP in the alliance domain.)
A deployable time bomb that explodes after a set duration and inflicts area damage. (Can only be used during PvP in the alliance domain.)
A long-ranged grenade with blinding properties. (Can only be used during PvP in the alliance domain.)
Unrefined noctenium-contaminated gorilla blood.
The peel from a banana contaminated with noctenium.
Unrefined Noctenium-contaminated Stone

Key required for keeping a noctenium extractor running. <font color = '#c21919'>[Warning!] The item will drop on the ground if you ride a vehicle, die, use a teleport scroll, perform unstuck, or go outside the territory.

Temporarily improves skills. Different effects are produced depending on the skill types.
Temporarily improves skills. Different effects are produced depending on the skill types. Additionally, PvP damage dealt is increased by 5%, and PvP damage received is decreased by 5%.

Temporarily improves skills. Different effects are produced depending on the skill types. Additionally, PvP damage dealt is increased by 5%, and PvP damage received is decreased by 5%.
Temporarily improves skills. Different effects are added depending on the skill types.

Material found only in super-powerful monsters. A source of life power for the monsters.
The heart is still pounding.

Creates soulbound lance. Will manifest PvP effects when enchanted. Creating noctenium weapons requires multiple elements rich in noctenium. Contaminated blood can only be obtained from gorillas in Free Traders territory. Banana peels can only be obtained in Enlightened Union territory. Noctenium shards can only be obtained from crystalline noctenium in Iron Order territory.

Creates soulbound twin swords. Will manifest PvP effects when enchanted. Creating noctenium weapons requires multiple elements rich in noctenium. Contaminated blood can only be obtained from gorillas in Free Traders territory. Banana peels can only be obtained in Enlightened Union territory. Noctenium shards can only be obtained from crystalline noctenium in Iron Order territory.

Creates soulbound greatsword. Will manifest PvP effects when enchanted. Creating noctenium weapons requires multiple elements rich in noctenium. Contaminated blood can only be obtained from gorillas in Free Traders territory. Banana peels can only be obtained in Enlightened Union territory. Noctenium shards can only be obtained from crystalline noctenium in Iron Order territory.

Provides HP recovery of $H_W_GOOD$value$COLOR_END per $H_W_GOOD$tickInterval$COLOR_END.

This mask with glowing blue eyes marks you as a powerful member of your alliance.
This winged mask with glowing blue eyes marks you as a leader in your alliance.

Hit enemies to force them to drop any extractor keys they carry and stun them for 10 seconds.
Ticket required for entering the Vault of Allies. Each player needs a ticket to use the teleportal, and each use of the teleportal consumes one ticket.

Learn a passive alliance skill that provides nearby allies immunity to stun, stagger, and knockdown effects. Assault commanders only. Only usable in alliance territories.
Learn a passive alliance skill that increases endurance and defense to nearby allies. Defense commanders only. Only usable in alliance territories.
Learn a passive alliance skill that rejuvenates the Stamina of nearby allies. Adjunct commanders only. Only usable in alliance territories.
